1.0.name: wordpress/wp-bandcamp
1.0.description:
With this plugin you can easily embed a Bandcamp Player into your website using a widget, an editor shortcode or both.

You can choose which type of layout you want to use and the colors for background and links for each single player.

You can also embed more players just typing different album/track IDs using commas to separate them.
